title: The Xiaomi 12 Pro is a phone that puts entertainment first
content:
Last year, Xiaomi managed to grab the second spot in the global smartphone market by pushing Apple to third. A seriously impressive feat, even though it was just for one quarter. The company sells a ton of phones priced under $300 worldwide, and that has helped it get ahead in the volume game. But it hasn’t earned its stripes in the flagship device arena. Perhaps that’s why it has included almost every top-end feature you can think of in its latest Xiaomi 12 Pro phone. I’ve been using it for the last few weeks, and it was really fun. The…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Xiaomi
description: Xiaomi 12 Pro is a great phone for entertainment with amazing screen, good camera, and blazing fast charging.
